title: Luxury Residences in the Heart of LA!
posting_body: ['717 Olympic', '717 West Olympic Blvd', 'Los Angeles, CA 90015', 'Url: <URL>', 'In Step With Downtown L.A. Rhythm', 'Fitness, views, services, design, and modern technology are all represented in elite metropolitan style at 717 Olympic.', 'Step into our controlled-access community and encounter that experience immediately.', 'The best of the city is right outside and, courtesy of the observation deck, always in view.', 'See our exhaustive amenity lists provided below.', 'Community Amenities', '24-hour fitness center • Business center and conference room • Concierge services • Controlled-access building • Dry cleaning service • Firepit area • Observation deck • Pet friendly* • Sky lounge • Theater room • Valet service (24-Hour) •', 'Wine lockers', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Built-in desk • Ceiling fan • Hollywood Hills Views* • Floor-to-ceiling windows • Century City Views* • Hardwood floors • Patio/ balcony • Vaulted ceiling • Walk-in closet • Washer and dryer', 'Monday:', '9AM-6PM', 'Tuesday:', '11AM-6PM', 'Wednesday:', '9AM-6PM', 'Thursday:', '9AM-6PM', 'Friday:', '9AM-6PM', 'Saturday:', '9AM-6PM', 'Sunday:', '9AM-6PM', 'Pets -  allowed Cats -  allowed Dogs -  allowed We love pets!', 'Please review our pet policy!']
